document.full_text: syrian forces have shot dead 31 people in the last 48 hours during demonstrations in a northwestern town, residents said on sunday, and official media said gunmen killed four policemen in the same town.
document.title: dozens killed in syria violence, including 4 police
lines_and_colors: syrian forces have shot dead 31 people in the last 48 hours during demonstrations in a northwestern town, residents said on sunday, and official media said gunmen killed four policemen in the same town.
